hero.title: #1 Telemedicine App: Online Doctor Consultation 24/7
hero.description: Skip the travel! Get expert medical advice from the comfort of your home. Our Telehealth app connects you with experienced doctors and healthcare providers.
hero.discount: First prescription and refill starting at a discount rate!
hero.downloadApp: Get StepAhead Health on your smartphone. Download the application now!

works.title: How Our Telemedicine App Works?
works.description: Few simple steps to reach your prescription:

steps.title: Create New Prescription
steps.description: Login to your account and create a new prescription by selecting your medications and desired pharmacy.

steps.title: Wait for Approval
steps.description: Our top providers will verify your prescription and give an approval and advice within 15 minutes.

steps.title: Pay and Get Set Go!
steps.description: You'll pay the provider fees and tada! your prescription will be sent to your pharmacy.

service.title: So, Which Telehealth Service Are You Looking For?
service.description: Instant prescription refills, lab tests or online doctor appoinments?

refills.title: Prescription Refills
refills.description: Get an instant prescription refill from our top-notch experienced providers seemlessly.

consultation.title: Create New Prescription
consultation.description: Make a new prescription and send to the doctor

provider.title: Are You a Provider?
provider.description: We would be happy to serve you. Sign up for your free telehealth provider account. The health community needs your expertise and practice.

provider.title: Are You A Provider?
